evidence.evidenceDesc: The murder took place at around 06:40. The victim was Sigma.NEWLINEThe cause of death was internal bleeding, seemingly caused by blunt trauma. The murder weapon is unknown.
The ladder in the supply closet had been disturbed; after the body was discovered,
Sigma's body was discovered on top of the {thing}.
Theta reportedly left her room at about 06:00. She cited that she woke up early, and wished to

Tau.speaker: STARTBLUETauENDCOLOR
Tau.speech: STARTREDAnd where *exactly* does that come in?ENDCOLOR

Iota.speaker: STARTBLUEIotaENDCOLOR
Iota.speech: STARTREDI'm not certain I follow your logic.ENDCOLOR

Theta.speaker: STARTBLUEThetaENDCOLOR
Theta.speech: STARTREDUhh... sorry, could you please explain that a little better?ENDCOLOR

Psi.speaker: STARTBLUEPsiENDCOLOR
Psi.speech: STARTREDU-um, s-sorry, I don't th-ink that's, uhh... quite ri-ght...?ENDCOLOR

Lambda.speaker: STARTBLUELambdaENDCOLOR
Lambda.speech: STARTREDAh-, not to bother, but could you elaborate on that a little further?ENDCOLOR

Epsilon.speaker: STARTBLUEEpsilonENDCOLOR
Epsilon.speech: STARTRED(Epsilon's eye bores into you with a challenging gaze.)ENDCOLOR

failDiscussion.speaker: Tau
failDiscussion.speech: STARTGREY(Tau gives a sudden, agitated sigh, coming out as a brisk huff.)ENDCOLOR

failDiscussion.speaker: Tau
failDiscussion.speech: Do you *mind*, Mu? Our *lives* are at stake.

failDiscussion.speaker: Tau
failDiscussion.speech: In case you've forgotten, this- this *small child*-

failDiscussion.speaker: Tau
failDiscussion.speech: -will *brutally kill all of us* if we don't figure this out in time!

failDiscussion.speaker: Iota
failDiscussion.speech: STARGREY(Iota casts his gaze to the far wall, unable to meet yours.)ENDCOLOR

failDiscussion.speaker: Iota
failDiscussion.speech: It seems I've... overestimated your talent.

failDiscussion.speaker: Iota
failDiscussion.speech: It seems I've trusted you with more than you are capable of.

lines.speaker: Lambda
lines.speech: Alright... Let's get this started on a better note than last time, yea?

lines.speaker: Lambda
lines.speech: So preferably no panicking. If possible.

lines.speaker: Theta
lines.speech: I'll... try. I don't know if I can promise much...

lines.speaker: Theta
lines.speech: What with... last time...

lines.speaker: Theta
lines.speech: Oh, God... I'm starting to feel sick again...

lines.speaker: Lambda
lines.speech: Hey. Focus. Remember, we have to bring our absolute best here.

lines.speaker: Gamma
lines.speech: Yeah, Lambda's right!

lines.speaker: Gamma
lines.speech: We gotta make sure we get the culprit right again!

lines.speaker: Iota
lines.speech: Indeed we do.

lines.speaker: Tau
lines.speech: First things first, why don't we share what information we have?

lines.speaker: Tau
lines.speech: The faster it's all out there, the faster we can make our decision and leave.

lines.speaker: Psi
lines.speech: Y-yeah, th-at s-sounds... nice.

lines.speaker: Theta
lines.speech: It'd help.

lines.speaker: Gamma
lines.speech: Sounds okay!

lines.speaker: Iota
lines.speech: I take it we are all agreed then. I will begin.

lines.speaker: Iota
lines.speech: First, we should closely examine the body. STARTGREENOur fileENDCOLOR states that the cause of death was internal bleeding.

lines.speaker: Iota
lines.speech: But, before we go any further, we should figure out the method through which we think the victim was killed

lines.speaker: Theta
lines.speech: Thanks... So, ah... I heard some weird noises

lines.speaker: Theta
lines.speech: Right! I STARGOLDwoke up earlyENDCOLOR, and I got a little bored.

lines.speaker: The
lines.speech: You will now be given a Choice phase.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: Throughout this tutorial, we will use the topic of whether or not the ocean is a soup as a placeholder.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: It's often a good idea to glance over your evidence at the beginning of a playback.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: Keep in mind that you can do so at any time during a Discussion!

prompt: What evidence do I have that makes it obvious that the sea contains nutrients...?

responses.speaker: User
responses.speech: STARTGREY(No... that doesn't necessarily prove there's nutrients in the sea we know, because it isn't around anymore...)ENDCOLOR

responses.speaker: User
responses.speech: STARTGREY(No... This is placeholder data! It doesn't have any significance!)ENDCOLOR

lines.speech: placeholder text
